verse: Soon after David moved into his new palace, he said to Nathan the prophet, “Look around! I live in a palace made of cedar, but the sacred chest is kept in a tent.”
Nathan replied, “The Lord is with you—do what you want.”
That night, the Lord told Nathan
to go to David and tell him:
Nathan told David exactly what the Lord had said.
